Text: You're a true Jam star sir for putting these up!Living many a mile from Gorgie I haven't seen a game for a year and a half, so if my crap internet service lets me get these, I'll seed them til we next win the league. ...or perhaps finish third again.

NAE CHANCE.
                    FAE A TRUE BLUE.

Aw pleeeease seed this pal! If you do, I promise I'll slaughter a Hun fer ye.
